description.value:
Trigger A demon you're aware of within 30 feet of you suffers from its sin vulnerability or critical fails at a saving throw against a mental effect

You make a quick cutting remark against the demon that takes advantage of the fiend's momentary disadvantage. The demon must attempt a @Check[will|against:class] save against your class DC.

Critical Success The demon is unaffected and likely to focus its attention on you in combat from this point forward.

Success The demon takes @Damage[2d6[mental]] damage.

Failure The demon takes @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the start of its next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, but the off-guard condition lasts until the end of the next round. The demon also takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,mental]] damage.
